data.meta_site_name: Spring Hill Memorial Park, Funeral Home & Cremation Services
data.text:
Wilma DePriest Thompson, age 85 of Spring Hill, TN passed away July 28, 2017. Homemaker, and member of Spring Hill United Methodist Church. Wilma is preceded in death by her loving husband of 65 years, Fred Carlos Thompson; son, Fred Thompson, Jr.; parents, Robert Noah & Hester Bomar DePreist; six sisters and one brother. Survived by daughters, Carol Ann (Carl) Coulson of Nolensville, TN, Connie Jane (Buddy) Abbott of Spring Hill, TN and Lisa Marie (Richard) Burt of Spring Hill, TN; brother, Larry C. (Emily) DePriest of Ashland, OH; 12 grandchildren; and 27 great grandchildren. Funeral services will be held 11:00AM Monday, July 31, 2017 at Spring Hill Memorial Funeral Home, Keith Sherwood officiating. Interment 2:00PM on Monday at Woodlawn Memorial Park. Pallbearers Steven Powers, Cory Burt, Ben Blanton, Peter Coulson, Brent Holman and Ricky Simmons. Memorials may be made to Avalon Hospice. Visitation will be held 2-6:00PM Sunday and one hour prior to the service Monday at Spring Hill Memorial Funeral Home, 5239 Main St., Spring Hill, TN. 37174. 931-486-0059 www.springhill-memorial.com

Visitation Details

Sunday, July 30th, 2017 2:00pm - 6:00pm, Spring Hill Memorial Funeral Home

Monday, July 31st, 2017 10:00am - 11:00am, Spring Hill Memorial Funeral Home

Service Information

Monday, July 31st, 2017 11:00am, Spring Hill Memorial Funeral Home

Interment Details

Woodlawn Memorial Park
